summary: CAR STARTED UP NOT RUNNING ON ALL CYLINDERS. REFUSED TO RUN ON ALL CYLINDERS.  ENGINE WARNING LIGHT (MIL) CAME ON.  MANUAL AND DEALER SAID TO HAVE VEHICLE TOWED TO DEALER IN THIS SITUATION.  CAR WENT TO DEALER.  BAD IGNITION COIL IS DIAGNOSIS.  DEALER SAYS NONE AVAILABLE IN U.S. OR CANADA.  DEALER DOESN'T KNOW WHEN IT CAN FIX.  CAR IS 4 MONTHS OLD WITH 3,800 MILES AND IS UNDRIVEABLE.  NO DATE SET FOR WHEN IT WILL BE REPAIRED. TS
